lead_paragraph: The Devils signed forwards Cam Janssen and Grant Marshall to new contracts yesterday. Terms of the deals were not disclosed.Janssen scored one goal and accumulated 114 penalty minutes in 48 games for the Devils last season. Marshall last played in the N.H.L. in 2005-6 with the Devils, totaling 25 points in 76 games.
